title: Cisco Secure Endpoint - Event
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into the event logs generated by Cisco Secure Endpoint.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

- The Cisco Secure Endpoint Event dashboard provides detailed insights into the event logs generated by Cisco Secure Endpoint. It includes total number of event logs, event severity, threat detections, techniques and tactics,  endpoint details and more.

For more information, see the [Cisco Secure Endpoint Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_secure_endpoint/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Cisco Secure Endpoint Event logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
